text: Collector K.S.Palanisamy handed over financial assistance sanctioned by the District Welfare Fund Committee to two persons here on Tuesday. While Rs.15,000 was given to Nasrunissa, a third year under graduate student for pursing her studies, Vishal, a five-year-old boy of Thottiyam suffering from skin ailment, was extended Rs.25,000 for his treatment at Chennai, a release said.
title: Assistance distributed
